product_name: Spark R&D Mr. Chomps Splitboard Crampons
long_description: The Spark R&D Mr. Chomps Splitboard crampons let you conquer icy steeps with little effort. Mr. Chomps can be used in fixed or free mode depending on terrain. Riser mounted on crampon keeps same depth of teeth in snow when used with heel lifts. Compatible with all Spark R&D bindings, these crampons can be used seamlessly with the LT pin system, sold separately. Also compatible with the new Voile dual climbing wires, not included. Fits splitboards with 26cm or smaller waists.
short_description: The Spark R&D Mr. Chomps Splitboard crampons let you conquer icy steeps with little effort.
